111.content:
Originally by: Golden Tiger

(First of all, this was Q-cot's original idea. I hope to have his permission to put it in this story.

Misty, Ash, Brock, and Pikachu were in Professor Oak's lab. Professor Oak had called the four of them to his lab to show them his latest invention.

"So... what is it?" Ash asked.

The machine was comprised of two booths connected by a pinkish tube on top and a monitor in between them.

"It's a telepod. Would one of you like to demonstrate it?" Oak asked.

Brock, Ash, and Pikachu all looked at Misty.

"I guess I'll go..." Misty said. She stepped into the left telepod.

Oak pressed a few buttons on the a keypad and both booths started to seal up from the top down.

Suddenly, Jigglypuff rolled in through the window and into the second telepod!

"Jiggly?" Jigglypuff said, as the telepod's door closed, sealing it inside.

The pink tube flashed brightly. When the flash cleared, the monitor read...

"DNA COMBINING COMPLETE"

The door of the second telepod opened, revealing Misty. Jigglypuff was nowhere to be seen.

"Are you okay, Misty?" Ash asked.

"Of course I am!" Misty replied, stepping out of the telepod booth.

"Well, I guess the experiment was a success..." Oak said. "You can go now."

So Misty, Ash, Brock, and Pikachu walked outside. As soon as they did...
111.title: The Experiment

1111.content:
Chapter 3: (ID #148016)
Original additions by Irift and Myself.

"...Make it double!" The team heard the familiar oath. Jessie, James and Meowth leaped out from behind a tree. "We saw you twerps trying out old man Oak's new invention." Jessie said.
"We want to know what it is." James replied.
"So tell us what you'se were doin'" Meowth said.

"We're not telling you bozos anything!" Ash shouted. Pikachu sparked at his cheeks. Meanwhile, Misty had an uneasy feeling in her stomache...

"Why are you so interested?" Brock said.
"One of Oak's inventions might will definitely please our boss." James said. "He'll be so glad, he'll let us retire in Cinnebar..."

"Just think, Lazing by the beach, drinking fruit punch..."Jesse daydreamed. The uneasy feeling in Misty's stomach turned into a bloated one. Her skin started to turn pink."

"We don't get nuttin' till we get his invention. So what is it!" Meowth shouted. He leaped toward Ash. Berore he could, everyone turned their attention to Misty. "Hey...What's...goin on?" Meowth said as turned his head...

--- WSoul's addition

Misty quickly swelled up until she was completely round. Oddly enough, her clothes stayed intact, albeit being stretched out.

"What the..." James said.
"Did she..." Jessie muttered
"Uh oh..." Meowth said.

Ash, Brock, and Pikachu just stared, bewildered.

"Is that what happened to Jigglypuff?!" Brock said.

Misty-Puff rolled towards Team Rocket, bowling them over and squashing them flat.

"Ow." the squashed trio said in unison.

"Whoa... puff." was all the still-ballooned Misty-Puff could say.

Suddenly, MistyPuff begins floating up into the air.

--- Irift's addition

She looked down her ballooned form. Her body was pretty much all she could see, but she somewhat managed to make out what was below her. She saw all of Pallet through the clouds. From her height, all the people looked like little Diglettes.
Her tiny hands rubbed what little of her body they could reach. She still felt like her own skin, albeit stretchy and slightly rubbery. She couldn't see it, but her eyes were encircled by a blue ring like Jigglypuffs. She thought about what she was going to do now that she was a balloon-puff-something. Then, the lights of a familiar town caught her eye...

Originally by Irift:

The bright blue and green lights of Cerulean City gym caught Misty's eye. She wanted to visit her sisters, but up until now she was at the mercy of the wind. Misty thought for a minute, then began waving her arms and legs in a swimming motion. Sure enough, her hot air balloon body began it's slow decent toward the gym. The roof was open, but there was no show, so the only ones there were Misty's three sisters; Lily, Daisy and Violet. They were just drying off from a afternoon swim.
"Hmm...won't they be surprised when their 'little sister' comes for a visit and rolls over them." Misty thought. "Although, I could just wait until they begin their show tomorrow and really surprise them....puff!"
11111.title: Cerulean Sisters

choices: She goes after her other sisters.
She fills herself up with water and drenches them.
111111.content:
Original Author Unknown:

"Ah.." Violet finished drying off her purplish blue hair with a towel. "Nothing like a nice swim in the middle of the day, eh girls?"

"Like, you said it!" Daisy nodded. "We haven't gotten many visiting trainers, so we've had plenty of time to relax.

"And that beats a lousy pokemon battle anyday..." Lily yawned, stretching out by the edge of the pool.

Suddenly, a massive pink sphere dropped down through the roof, landing right on top of Lily.

"Suprise, sisters!" Misty said with a laugh.

"GAH! Misty!?" Violet leapt back. "You've gotten.. like.. taller."

"Yeah, I've changed. Which is more than what I can say for YOU three!" Misty shook an inflated fist at them. "You're just as lazy as ever! How dare you call yourselves Gym Leaders!" She looked down at Lily, who was wriggling her way out from under Misty. "...You guys need to get in shape." Misty grinned evily. "Here, try a round one!" She scooped up Lily, and held her in front of her face.

"Misty!! Like, what are you- MMPH!" Misty forefully blew into Lily's body, as her own started to shrink. Lily's eyes widened as her own body began to expand into a large sphere. Her skin acquired a shine like rubber, though it wasn't pink like a Jiggilypuff.

Finally, Misty was back to normal, with her own skin color, though the shine remained. Lily, on the other hand, was now as large as Misty was before. Misty kept her older sister's lips closed by pinching them together with her hand.

"You know, that look suits you." Misty said. "But I don't think you're ready for so much air. Let's see." She let go of Lily's lips.

With an embarrasing 'Braaap'ing noise, Lily's round body flew around the top of the pool, before landing face up on the water, a flattened version of her former self.

"Guess not." Misty shrugged. "Now then..."

Leaf was on her way home in Pallet Town to visit Professor Oak. When she got to Pallet Town, she stopped home first to visit her mother.

“Mom, I’m home.” Leaf said.

She looked around her whole house but couldn’t find her mother. She went into the kitchen and found a green apple with a note next to it. The note read:

“Leaf,

Professor Oak found this green apple on his new apple tree and wants you to try it.

You’re loving mother.”

Leaf picked up the apple and took a bite out of it. It was really sweet for being a green apple. She thought it should be sour but it was different. When she finished the apple, she changed into her favorite green bikini and went out side. She sat down in her favorite lawn chair and fell asleep. Then leaf was awakened by a strange feeling. She looked down at her belly and saw it was growing. Not only that but she saw she was green. Leaf went inside and up to her room. When she got there, she looked in her mirror and saw it stopped growing. She put her hands onto her belly and felt the weight of it straining against her back. Her belly was as big as a basketball but felt like a pile of bricks. Leaf sat down on her desk chair and rubbed her large belly.

“Nothing to fear about. The apple must have done this to me.” Leaf said.

Leaf then felt…

12.content: Johto Trainers and Gym Leaders go here.
12.title: Johto

123.content: Clair was a bitch and shes gonna pay
123.title: Clair

1231.content:
"Dragonair can no longer battle. Haunter wins. Therefore, victory goes the challenger, Alicia."

Clair could not believe it. Her once pristine Dragonair laid defeated on the floor. Across the other side of the battlefield, an ecstatic trainer celebrating her eighth and final badge win with her pokemon. To said she was stunned would be an understatement. Utterly flabbergasted, she struggled to process this ordeal. Still in deep thought, she failed to notice Alicia and Haunter walking towards her.

"Thank you for the great match." She extend her hand for a handshake.

Clair seemed offended by the gesture. Her expression morphed from confusion to genuine anger. She cross her arms and in a defiant tone said "No."

"I don't understand. What do you mean no?" Alicia asked

"I mean you haven't earned your badge. That battle was a fluke."

"WHAT? You agree to my challenge, I beat you cleanly, and you have the audacity to said 'That doesn't count'? You're gym leader, not a child. Act like one!"

"Listen brat.."

"My name is Alicia!"

"Whatever. I'm the gym leader and if I think you're not worthy of the badge, then so be it. Come back when you're ready." Clair stated coldly to the irate trainer. She began to turn around when a surprisingly strong grip was felt on her shoulder. Alicia was not done with her.

"I'll say this one last time. Give my badge gym."

"My decision is final! Get out of my sight! There is nothing you can do to change my mind!"
1231.title: Defeat, Denial, Demise

12311.content:
Alicia couldn’t believe it. Here she was about to earned her final badge, but Clair, one of the strongest trainers in all of Johto, was going to denied her that chance. Unfortunately for Clair, Alicia wasn’t ready to back down. “You should really rethink your decision.”

Clair was at her wit’s end. “Get this through your thick head. You are not worthy of this Rising Badge,” She shoved the badge in Alicia’s face before grasping it back in her hand. “And just who do you think you are trying to order me around? What makes you think I’ll change my mind?”

“With this,” Alicia smirked as she held a white Poké Ball with the letters “IN” on it. She tossed the ball into the air and from it emerged blue smoke. The smoke enveloped the gym leader who was coughing from the sudden lack of air. As quick as it started, the smoke dissipated seconds later.

Clair inspected her body for any changes. Realizing that nothing happens, she turned her attention back to the smirking trainer. “You got some nerve. First, you insult me in my own gym and then you tried to gas me out. Forget about getting the badge! Leave this gym and never come bac—mrrrffff!!!” In midst of her tirade, an unexpected rush of air caused her cheeks to puff up.

Alicia giggled, “I’m sorry, I didn’t hear the last part. Could you repeat that?”

Swallowing down the air, Clair was about to scold Alicia when her mouth wide open and began sucking in the air. She inhaled with the same ferocity as a vacuum cleaner, consuming the air into her gullet. Her torso expanding rapidly to accommodate the incoming air. Her body morphed into a roundish shape as it absorbed her arms and legs. Eventually, Clair’s suction dwindle to a halt, leaving the inflated gym leader out of breath. “Uggh… I feel winded… and bloated,” she panted.

Alicia broke into a fit of laughter, unable to contain her amusement. “That is an understatement. Take a good look of yourself.”

Clair looked down and was horrified with she saw. Her once her trim figure has now changed into a sphere. Only her hands, feet, and head remain unaffected from her inflation. “What happened to me?! I’m a… giant blue ball! How did this happen?!!”

“Well, if you ask me, it seems your body swelled up from your pride and arrogance,” Alicia commented.

“Silence! This is your fault!” shouted Clair, pointing an accusing finger at Alicia. “What kind of Poké Ball is that?!”

Alicia answered, “I’m glad you asked. This is the Inflate Ball. It’s designed to prevent people from stealing Pokémon or Poké Balls. When enough smoke fumes is inhaled, the person begins inflating almost immediately. Of course, the Inflate Ball have other purposes like teaching a certain blue-haired sphere woman a lesson.”

Outraged by the remark, Clair waddled towards Alicia. “Listen here, you’re going to get me back to normal or so help me I’ll—WWHHHOOOOAAAA!!!” Clair took an awkward step forward and immediately crashed to the floor.

“Wow, such a graceful fall from the gym leader,” Alicia mocked. “Oh hey, you dropped the Rising Badge.”

“Give that back!” commanded Clair. “You haven’t earned the right to hold that badge! Now get over here and help me!”

Alicia stared at the badge in her hands as she pondered her options.
12311.title: Alicia's Ultimatum

choices: Nobody comes. Clair sleeps in her gym and wakes up back to normal.
She doesn't have to wait as she starts deflating.
123111.content:
“I don’t think so, Clair. In fact, I’m taking this badge with me while you can stay here for all I care.” Alicia retorted.

“W-Wait! You can’t leave me like this! I can’t do gym battles as a sphere. Change me back now!” Clair whined.

“Calm down you big baby! The effects aren’t permanent. Maybe this time alone will give you time to work on your attitude. Good-bye.” Alicia stated as she headed for the door.

“My attitude? MY attitude?!! You’re leaving me in this helpless state and I need work on my attitude? Fine then, go ahead and leave! I would rather be a helpless balloon than be helped by a hypo—” The sound of a door slamming shut broke Clair out of her rant. “That ungrateful little… AAAHHHHH!! The least she could do was let me finish!”

Trying to cope with her anger, Clair calmed herself with several deep breaths. “Got to stay compose. I won’t let some unappreciative brat get the better of me. I’ll show her what happens when people disrespect me. Just need figure out how to move.” She proceed to wiggle her body about, flapping her hands and feet. Despite her efforts, she only managed to wobble her ball-shaped body.

As time passed, Clair grew more and more frustrated. Her movement became more frantic. Her teeth grated violently while her eyebrows twitched. Even with the increased movement, her orbicular body refuses to budge. “THAT'S IT!!” she snapped. “I’ve been wobbling around here for who know how long, and I haven’t move at all! I guess I’ll have to wait for someone to come. Although it would be embarrassing being seen like this, it’s my only option.”
123111.title: Leaving the Bluenette Ball Behind

choices: Moments later, another trainer enters the gym.
1231111.content:
It didn’t long before Clair heard the door opening. She looked up and saw Lance, Johto’s Pokémon Champion and her cousin.

“Clair? Are you here? I thought I would come over for a…” He trailed off once he saw his cousin. Instead of seeing Clair face-to-face, he was met with a spherical bluenette prone on the floor. “Umm… Do I want to know what happen to you?” he asked hesitantly.

“There was a… disagreement of sorts. Nothing more,” Clair stated coldly, averting her head from Lance.

Lance wasn’t buying it. She clearly antagonized someone, and her globular body was her punishment. “You lost a gym battle and refuse to hand over the badge again, didn’t you?” Lance guessed. He sighed when Clair wince from his response. “Clair, you can’t let this happen every time one you lost a gym battle. Do you really want people to know you as a sore loser?”

She huffed, “So what? I’m a gym leader. It’s my obligation to challenge and test all trainers. And if I think they’re not worthy, regardless of the battle’s outcome, then so be it. It’s my decision to make and mine only. Besides, after what that brat did to me, she doesn’t deserve that badge.”

“I understand that but you’re letting your pride cloud your judgement. If this continues, trainers will stop challenging you. Is that what you want?”

“N-No, but I shouldn’t be punished for doing my job.”

“Obviously the challengers don’t share the same consent as you. Look, all I’m trying to say you shouldn’t cheat the trainers out of earning a badge, especially the ones that beat you.”

Clair thought for a moment before answering. “I’ll… I’ll consider it, but only because you asked.”

“Thank you.” Lance gave her a pat on the back, her rotund body wobbled and jostled from the hit.

“H-Hey! Don’t do that!”

“What? You mean this?” He gave a slighter harder pat and watched her body jostled again, earning himself a glare from the bluenette. “Relax, Clair. I was playing around.”

“Well if you’re done amusing yourself at my expense, maybe you can help me find a way to get back to normal.”

“I wish I could but I have to be somewhere in a few minutes. Don’t worry, once I’m done, I’ll come right back. See you later.” Lance reassured as he made his way to the door.

“Lance, wait! Don’t leave me here!” She cried out just as the door closes. “Lance? Lance?!! LANCE!!!!!”
1231111.title: Cousin Lance Comes for a Visit

choices: Alica tries to bury the hatchet with Clair.
Clair suddenly appears at the center and wants revenge on Alicia.
12311111.content:
With his ears still ringing from Clair’s screech, Lance made his way towards the Pokemon Center. He figured if he hurries, he should be able to speak to the trainer that defeated and inflated Clair. “There it is,” He spotted the building and headed inside.

“Welcome to the Pokémon Center. Would you like to… Oh, Lance, welcome back. Do you need anything?” Nurse Joy welcomed.

“Actually, yes. Has anyone recently come here after challenging the gym?”

“I don’t think so. However, I do recall seeing someone holding something that resembled a dragon’s face. Alicia was her name I believe.

“Do you know where she is now?”

“No, she said she wanted to be alone for a while. It might take some time before she … Oh, wait. Here she comes.”

Alicia asked, “Are my Pokémon healed yet, Nurse Joy?”

“I’ll check on them now, Alicia,” Nurse Joy answered. “In the meantime, Lance would like to speak with you.”

Alicia blinked, “L-Lance? As in Lance, the Pokémon Champion? And he wants to talk… t-to me?”

“That’s right,” Lance answered. Alicia turned around and jumped when she saw the champion himself. “It’s a pleasure to meet you, Alicia.”

“I-It’s an honor to meet you as well. Sorry if I seem flustered. It just… I can’t believe I’m talking to the champion.”

“It’s quite all right. Do you mind if we chat for a minute?”

“No! I-I mean I don’t mind at all,” Alicia corrected herself as the two walked toward a nearby bench. “So did you want to talk about?”

“Your battle with Clair, specifically the aftermath.”

“Oh,” Alicia muttered dejectedly. “Then you see her.”

“It’s kind of hard to not notice a giant human sphere.”

“True. I just don’t get how someone like her can act so childish. Not handing over the badge is one thing, but to insult and mock me is ridiculous. She infuriated me so much I thought I would teach her a lesson. Thinking about it now, I went too far.” She sighed, slumping her shoulders.

Lance placed a hand on Alicia’s shoulder. “Don’t beat yourself up. At least you’re willing to admit your mistakes. Besides, if anyone else was in your position, I’m pretty sure they all would’ve done the same thing to Clair. Tell you what, after Nurse Joy returns your Pokémon, we go back to the gym and then you can try making amends with Clair?”

Alicia smiled, “Sure, maybe she’ll turn over a new leaf.”
12311111.title: Meeting Alicia

choices: Clair was unimpressed with Alicia's apology.
Touched by the heartfelt confession, Clair apologized as well.
123111111.content:
“Are you sure this will work? What if Clair doesn’t accept my apology?” Alicia asked Lance as they approached the Blackthorn City Gym.

“It’s worth a shot. I know she can be a smug and intimidating individual, but she takes great pride in what she does… sometimes to a fault. If apologizing can helped her see in a new light, then I said go for it.” Lance reasoned.

“If you said so. Okay, here we go,” Alicia opened the door and the two walked inside.

Almost immediately, they were greeted by the bloated bluenette. “It’s about time to you got back, Lance!” yelled Clair. “You sure took your sweet time getting back.”

“Thank you for the warm welcome back, Clair. But I didn’t come here alone.”

“You brought someone along? Idiot! It’s bad enough you see me like this, and now…” her voice trailed off when she noticed Alicia. Her hands balled into fists and her face contorted into a scowl at the mere sight of the trainer. “This… This is who you bring? She’s the reason why I’m in this situation!”

“I’m well aware of what happen between you two, but—”

“I thought you of all people would take this seriously. Why on earth would you bring this arrogant little nuisance back to my gym?”

“Nuisance?!” Alicia blurted. “Look here, you bloated beach ball. I—”

Clair interrupted, “Watch your mouth! Just because I cannot move does not mean I will tolerate your disrespect. After everything that happens, after all the humiliation I suffered at your hands, you think you can come back and gloat in my face? Not like—Mrrph!” Clair’s rant was abruptly broken when her cheeks suddenly swelled up.

“Uh-oh.”

“What’s wrong with Clair?” Lance asked.

“The inflation is wearing off. We better get out of here.” Alicia grabbed Lance’s hand and pulled him to the door. Once they were outside, they stood by a window and observed the ball-shaped bluenette.

Back in the gym, Clair was battling against with the air inside her. Her eyes were shut tight as her cheeks turned reddish. She flapped her hands and kicked her feet furiously as the pressure reached its climax. It was a battle she was doomed to lose.

Unable withstand the pressure any longer, Clair opened her mouth and unleash a torrent of air. The violent windstorm propelled her spherical body backward to the other side of the gym. Her bloated butt made contact with the wall before bouncing off and barreling down another direction.

Meanwhile, Alicia and Lance watched Clair ricochets around the gym with reckless abandon. “Umm… shouldn’t we help her?” Lance asked.

Alicia retorted, “Believe me, I tried that the first time using the Inflate Ball on someone. It didn’t end well for me. Right now, we wait for Clair to finish deflating. It’s our best and safest option.”

The two resume watching Clair whizzed around the gym. Over time, her once massive body return to its normal shape. Once the last remains of air escaped her mouth, Clair slid across the floor before coming to a stop at the side wall. “Ugh, I will never live down this day,” she grunted.

“Clair!” Lance yelled, running toward his cousin with Alicia following behind. “Clair, are you all right?”

“I’m fine, Lance. Although, I would be better if she was not here.” Clair stared at Alicia who glared daggers back at the gym leader.

“All right, that’s enough,” Lance stated, drawing attention from the two females. “Look, it’s oblivious you two don’t like each other. Both of you feel the other has wronged you. I’m not asking you to make up and be friends, but at least try to come to a mutual understanding. The last thing that we all need is for the situation to elevate out of control.”

Clair and Alicia stood in silence, staring at one another as they processed Lance’s statement. Alicia let out a sigh before speaking. “Okay, I’ll do it. That’s why I came here.”

Lance smiled at Alicia and then turned to the bluenette. “Clair?” The gym leader crosses her arms and looked away. “Clair…” Lance grabbed ahold of Clair’s ear and pulled.

“Ow ow ow ow ow! All right, I’ll apologize. Just let go already. Ow!” she cried.

“Good,” He complied as he released Clair’s ear. “I’ll be waiting outside to hear the news. Oh, and Clair, make sure you actually apologize.”

Clair growled at the remark as Lance walked out the door.

“Well then, I guess I’ll start first,” Alicia said. “Clair, I’m sorry for everything I did. You take your role as gym leader very seriously. I was irate with your lack of cooperation and took it out on you. It was wrong to inflate you, and for that, I’m deeply and truly sorry.”
123111111.title: Setting Their Differences

choices: The next day, Clair gets a surprise visit from her grandfather.
She bursts through the doors and bounces toward Blackthorn city.
1231111111.content:
Clair spoke, “That’s not going to cut it. After what you did, you have to do a lot better than a simple apology.”

Alicia sighed, “Okay, what do I have to do?”

“Get on your knees and beg for forgiveness.”

“Excuse me?!!”

“You heard me. I want you to get on your knees and beg for my forgiveness. Come on, get to it.” Clair ordered.

Alicia grumbled as she reluctantly dropped to her knees and started pleading. “Oh Clair, can you ever forget me for my actions? I was wrong to treat you so cruelly.”

The bluenette couldn’t help but savor the moment. “Hmm, I’m not sure. You’re saying the right things, but I don’t think you really mean it.”

“You’re right,” Alicia agreed through gritted teeth. “I was foolish to believe that pitiful attempt would convince you. You are the world’s best dragon master. Someone of your stature deserves far better praise.”

“I’m glad you finally understand. But instead of giving me compliments, how about you prove your worth by kissing my feet?”

“Are you kidding me?!,” Alicia shouted as she looked at her tormentor. The smug grin on Clair’s face indicated she was serious; she even placed her left foot on Alicia’s lap. “That’s it! I’m done playing along. Can you apologize already so we can move on?”

“Hmph, Fine. As much as I enjoy punishing you, I do have other manners to attend. I’m sorry… what was your name again? Doesn’t matter, I hope you’ll accept my apology and we can put this situation behind us or something. Now that’s over, you may leave now.”

Alicia wasn’t ready to leave just yet. After giving her sincere apology and then begging like a pleasant, this was her reward? A halfhearted… No, a piss-poor attempt at an apology from a gym leader with a gigantic ego? Oh no, forget about showing Clair humility. Alicia had something else to show the ungrateful woman.

“Did you not hear me? I said you may leave now.” Clair reiterated before Alicia grasped her bodysuit and pulled until the two were face-to-face.

“First off, my name is Alicia. Secondly, I heard you, but I’m not leaving just yet,” Alicia stated coldly. “You see, I learn something about you. It doesn’t matter if Lance, myself, or anyone else tries to help you. You won’t change. You’ll still be the same arrogant, unappreciative person you are now.”

“Who are you to said what—”

“Quiet!” she tightens her grip and pulled Clair in closer, silencing the bluenette. “Berating and demeaning me is one thing, but giving that poor excuse of an apology, that’s where I draw the line. You need to be taught humility and humbleness, and I know exactly how.”

Clair stated coldly, “You wouldn’t.”

“Don’t believe me? Okay, it’s your bloated funeral,” Alicia replied as she activated the Inflate Ball.

~~~



“They been in there for a while now,” Lance mumbled. He stood outside the Blackthorn Gym, waiting for Clair and Alicia to end their dispute. While hoping the two would come to a peaceful agreement, he couldn’t shake off this uneasy feeling of something happening between them. He was considering checking on them when he heard the door open and saw Alicia.

“How did it go?” Lance asked.

“Well, at first, Clair thought she was too dignified to give me a proper apology, so I took it upon myself to teach her a few things about humility.”

“What do you mean ‘teach’?”

“I think you’ll have a better understand if you saw Clair yourself. I’m heading at back to the Pokémon Center. It was nice meeting you, Lance,” Alicia waved goodbye and walked away.

“Oh, this can’t be good.” Lance sighed as he opened the gym’s door. He saw a sphere-shaped Clair bouncing around.

“Lance, help me! That little brat did it again!” Clair shouted before colliding with the oncoming wall face first. “Ow! Even after I apologize, she still had the nerve to inflate me. She thought I needed a lesson in humility. How is throwing me around like a ball supposed to teach me humility? Ow! How long are you going to stand there? Hurry up and hel—Ow!— help me!”

Taking in everything he heard, Lance decided to leave Clair with her problems. Clearly, she learned nothing throughout the entire ordeal. With a sigh, he walked away.

“Lance! Get—Ow!—back here!” She waited for some kind of response from her cousin, but alas, Lance did not return. “Great, me, a prestigious Gym Leader, turned into a helpless balloon not once, but twice in the same day. Now here I am bouncing around like some humanoid pinball. Why me—Ow! When will this nightmare end?!!!”
1231111111.title: A Humiliation Attempt Turns Horribly Wrong

choices: She's interrupted by an robbery at the Pokémon Center.
12311111111.content:
“WHAT?!!! What do you mean I’m suspended from my Gym duties?!”

It has been one bad moment after another for Clair. From losing her Gym battle against Alicia to inflating into a balloon, she suffered a great deal from yesterday alone. She hoped today would bring her less stress. That wasn’t the case when her grandfather visited the Gym to talk to her.

“Clair, I’m sure you’re fully aware of the growing concern surrounding this Gym,” He reasoned calmly. “Especially after what transpired the past day.”

“Yes, grandfather, I’m well aware,” replied the frustrated bluenette. “I’ll admit that yesterday’s events were… out of control, but I assure you, that was an irregularity from the norm. There’s no need to suspend me over something like that.”

“Clair, we both know that’s a false accusation. And even if that was true, that doesn’t excuse your treatment towards the challengers. I beginning to think your position as Gym Leader has severely inflated your ego.”

“Please don’t say inflated. I’m trying to put those memories behind me. And my ego is perfectly in check!”

Her grandfather raised a questioning eyebrow, “Really? Then answer this question: Why don’t you hand over the badge whenever you lost?”

“I… um… well… you see…”

“Or how about when you berate the trainers once they’re defeated?”

“That… I…” Clair struggled to find an answer.

“Just as I thought. Listen, Clair, I know how committed you are to your duty as Gym Leader. However, if you continue this trend, you’ll tarnish the reputation of not only yourself but the Gym’s reputation as well. Keep that in mind during your time off. For the time being, I’ll be acting as the Gym’s temporary leader.”

“But Grandfather, that’s—”

“Clair,” he spoke in a firm but stern manner, causing his granddaughter to flinch. “this is not negotiable.”

The gym filled with silence and uneasiness as the two family members stared down one another. Clair glared at her grandfather, clearly irate with his, in her mind, unjustified decision. He remained firm and decisive, fully committed to his decision. Over time, the bluenette’s patience dwindled until she reached her boiling point.

“Fine! Do as you please!” she snapped. She stormed out the Gym and slammed the door shut.

Her grandfather sighed, “It’s probably best for her to sort things out herself. I can only hope she uses this time to reevaluate herself and comes back as a new person.”

“Who does he think he is?!” shouted the irate Clair as she marched through the city. “He thinks he can walk to my Gym and suspend me because he’s the Dragon Clan Leader and my grandfather? Hah! He can take care of the Gym for as long as he like. I’m using this break to visit…
12311111111.title: Taking a Temporary Leave

choices: Screw that, chase after the Grunts.
Listen to Alicia and find Officer Jenny.
123111111113.content:
“Stop! Thieves!” shouted Nurse Joy. “They’ve stolen Pokémon from the center!”

Clair looked up and spotted the two thieves running in her direction. Both were clad in black clothing emblazon with a red R across their chests while wearing gray gloves and boots. Each of them was also carrying a bag filled with stolen Poké Balls.

“Criminals in my city? I think not,” Clair scoffed as she pulled out a Poké Ball and released her Dragonair. “Dragonair, stop them in their tracks with Dragon Breath.” The blue dragon cried out before unleashing a powerful gust from its mouth, knocking down the robbers. “For a pair of robbers, stealing in broad daylight probably isn’t a wise decision. Especially in those black uniforms; you stick out like a sore thumb,” Clair chastised. “Now hand over the stolen Poké Balls before you two get any ideas. I would hate to get my hands dirty from dealing with low-life thugs.”

“Low-life thugs?! You clearly don’t know who we are!” shouted the male thief.

“Yeah, we’re part of the infamous group Team Rocket,” added the female thief.

“Never heard of you nor do I care to know,” Clair replied haughtily. “Look, how about you fools drop this robbery attempt and walk away? At least with that, you will manage to salvage some of your dignity.”

“Never! These Pokémon are for the glory of Team Rocket. We will use them to how we see fit and no one will stop us,” said the female Rocket Grunt.

“And no one insults our great name. If you want these Pokémon back, then you’ll have to fight for them,” challenged the male Rocket Grunt as the duo threw out their Poké Balls, summoning a Raticate and Grimer.

Clair shook her head, “You really think the two of you can stand against the likes of me? Fine, but it’s your funeral; I show you the power of the world’s best Dragon master. Dragonair, use ice be— Ow!!” The bluenette wailed when a speeding Poké Ball nailed her face. Her hands immediately covered her face, muffling her groans. Dragonair, the Rocket Grunts, and their Pokémon watched the Poké Ball opened up and enveloped the distressed Clair with a blue gas before it dispersed seconds later.

After the pain subsided, Clair removed her hands from her face, and, with seething rage, pointed an accusing finger. “Who did it?! Which one of you imbeciles did it?! Answer me!!”

Both Rocket Grunts shook their heads as they were taken aback by Clair’s indignant outburst. Even their Pokémon cowered behind them for fear of facing the fuming woman.

“Liars!” Clair marched towards the Rocket Grunts. “I should have known you goons would use an underhand tactic. You two realized you couldn’t beat me, so you hurl a Poké Ball at me as an attempt to escape. Well, forget about returning to your gang; I’m personally taking you to jail myse—What so funny?” she noticed the thieves were snickering before they pointed at her lower body. Annoyed, she turned her head.

“AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!”
Everyone within Blackthorn City jumped from the bluenette’s blood-curling scream. Those within proximity covered their ears from the shrilled screech.

“My butt! My butt is growing!” Clair watched her rear swelled before her very eyes. Placing her hands behind herself, she gasped as her rear pushed against her hands. Her growing cheeks were quickly approaching bubble butt status, stretching her bodysuit to accommodate its expansive growth. “This… this can’t be happening. How is this happening?”

“I don’t know, wide load,” taunted the female runt. “Why not ask the Poké Ball?”

“Poké Ball? Wait…” Clair turned around and picked up the Poké Ball, unintentionally displaying her inflating butt at the snickering Rocket Grunts. One look at the white coating and the lettering confirm her suspicion: she’s holding an Inflate Ball. “This… this better not belong to—”

“Give us back our Pokémon!”

“—that… brat,” Clair gritted her teeth at the familiar voice of Alicia, who just caught up with the Gym Leader and Rocket Grunts.


“Give up now, thieves! Between Clair and myself, there’s no chance of… Um, Clair, your butt’s growing.”

“I know! And it’s your fault! Thanks to your accursed Inflate Ball, I have a behind the size of a Wailmer,” Clair wiggled her inflating rear at Alicia, grimacing at the noticeable bobble her cheeks produced.

“Sorry, that was meant for the robbers.”

“Really, because your aim suggests a different story. I think this is payback for yesterday.”

“What? No! Look, we shouldn’t be arguing now. We have these robbers to worry about.”

“Oh please, like those imbeciles would even think of leaving under my wat—Ack!” Clair shrieked as she felt someone slapped her enlarged butt, sending it into a bouncing fit. She craned her neck around and saw the female Rocket Grunt smiling back at her. “W-what? When did you…”

“It wasn’t that hard. Your bubble butt makes for a great cover up,” The cheeky Grunt responded with a harder slap, prompting another yelp from the bluenette and more butt wobbling.

Clair’s face burned with embarrassment. Never in her life would she find herself in this situation. She, a prideful, sometimes overconfident Gym Leader, having her now beach ball sized butt cheeks spanked like some bad-mannered child.

“You think this is funny? Let’s see how you fare with a massive rear end!” Before Clair could use the Inflate Ball, the male Grunt snatched it out of her hands.

“Sorry, but we’re on a schedule. We’ll take this off your hands, though,” he said.

“See ya later, suckers,” The female Grunt bid them farewell, but not before giving Clair’s butt one last slap and then hightailed it with her partner.

“You’re not getting away!” shouted an irate and red-faced Clair. “No one makes a mockery of me and walks away! Come on, Dragonair, we’re going after them.”

“Hold on,” Alicia stepped in front of Clair. “You won’t catch them in your condition.”

“Are you suggesting I let them go? You saw what they did; my butt was their personal drum!”

“I know, but maybe we should find Officer Jenny first. She could patrol the city and help us have a better chance finding them.”
123111111113.title: Team Rocket Encounter

1231111111132.content:
Clair looked behind at her butt and was displeased at what she saw. A pair of globular orbs bulging prominently from her bodysuit; unfortunately, its growth continues, already passing her hips in width. With a cautious finger, she poked her left cheek and watched it wobble effortlessly. There’s no way Clair can even hope of chasing those goons. She couldn’t run, much least walk, without her inflated butt bouncing and swaying behind her. She would be the laughingstock of the entire city.

“Dragonair, return,” she sighed, “Fine, we’ll go with your plan.”

“R-really?” Alicia asked, surprised by the bluenette’s willingness.

“Yes, I can’t chase them with this… this blubbery behind, much to the credit of your incompetence.”

“I said I was sorry.”

“Whatever, finding Officer Jenny is our best bet right now, and I assume your Pokémon were stolen, along with your Inflate Ball?” Clair watched the young trainer nod her head. “All right, I’ll help you out but you better keep your stupidity to a minimum. I suffer enough embarrassment to last a lifetime. Now let’s find Officer Jenny.”

Alicia almost lashed out at the arrogant Gym Leader, but watching Clair clumsily waddled while her butt bounced around was enough consolation. “Sure thing, partner,” she said, smacking Clair’s bubble butt. Casting a smirk, she casually walked ahead of the mortified and outraged bluenette who waddled slowly behind her, shouting profanities.

~~~


“Pull harder!”

“I can’t! Clair, I think you’re too big to fit through the door.”

“Impossible! Keep pulling!”

All the officers inside the Police Department were perplexed by the commotion at the entrance: Alicia struggling to pull Clair in the building, specifically Clair’s swollen rear. With her cheeks the size of a pair of exercise balls, she has grown too wide for the double doors.

“What do you think I’m doing?!” Alicia shouted. “I keep pulling but you’re not budging. Just admit it, Clair, your butt is too big to make it inside.”

“No, I can fit! We need more help,” Clair looked up and spotted the officers, “Hey! Do you plan on standing there and watching, or are you going to lend a hand?”

Before any officer could response, out came an annoyed Officer Jenny.

“What’s with all that the noise?” she questioned, drawing the attention of everyone else. “Why is everyone standing around? We have a robbery happening as we… Clair? What happened to you?”

“Forget about me! The robbers, did you find them?”

“No, after Nurse Joy contacted me, I sent out a patrol squad but I hadn’t heard from them since. You wouldn’t happen to see them, Clair?”

“Yes, I’ll explain everything once I get inside,” Clair grabbed hold of the walls and tried to pull herself and her oversized butt indoor. “C-come on! I can make inside. I’m not that big!”

Confused by what she’s witnessing, Officer Jenny gestured toward Alicia. “Did the robbers have something to do with Clair’s… enlarged figure?” she whispered.

“Um, kinda. It’s a long story. How about we talk outside before Clair wedges herself?” Alicia whispered back.

“Right,” Officer Jenny said before clearing her throat. “Okay, everyone, return to your posts. I’ll be outside talking with these two. The moment anyone hears about the robbers, notify me immediately,” she addressed her officers as they saluted and went back to their stations.

After removing Clair from the entrance and saving her from further humiliation, both she and Alicia explained their story to Officer Jenny.

“Team Rocket? I thought they disbanded when their leader was defeated. Great, this is direr than I thought,” Officer Jenny said.

“Why?” Clair asked. “If those goons are anything to laugh at, then the rest of them shouldn’t be a problem.”

“You don’t understand, Clair. Team Rocket steals Pokémon for a living. They could care less about their well-being. We have to find them before they sell off the Pokémon or worse…”

“Worse…” Alicia muttered fearfully. She couldn’t bear thinking about Team Rocket bringing any harm or injury to the stolen Pokémon. “NO!” she shouted, “We can’t let that happen. Those Pokémon need our help; not just mine, but all the trainers worried for their Pokémon.”

Hearing the distressed young trainer voiced her concerns, Officer Jenny comforted Alicia. “I give you my word: I won’t stop until every trainer is reunited with their beloved Pokémon. We will get them back.”

“Of course we will, you have me,” Clair snobbishly stated. “I may have let those goons escape, but I’m not someone that repeat mistakes. I’ll personally make them regret ever coming to my city.”

“Clair, unless you’re planning on sitting on the thieves, they’ll be too busy laughing at your giant butt to take you seriously,” Alicia joked.

Clair growled and scowled at Alicia. “The only reason I’m like this is due to your careless intrusion, you brat!” she spat as she stomps her foot, triggering a series of bounces from her rotund rear. “I had those fools cowering before me and then you show up, causing me nothing but irritation. You do understand how infuriating is being with someone that has no sense of decency?”

“Yeah, I’m staring right at her.”

And thus began the slinging of verbal attacks between the two trainers. They heavily expressed their disdain towards one another via insults, sarcastic remarks, and slandering. The more time they spent shouting, the more vicious and heated their comments became. Before their trash-talking had any chance to turn physical, Officer Jenny in stepped in and reprimanded the girls.

“That’s enough from both of you!” she scolded. “I don’t know what history you two have but I need you to put that aside. Focus on finding and rescuing the stolen Pokémon, understand?”

Clair and Alicia glared at one another for a few more seconds before they turned away and folded their arms. “Fine,” they begrudgingly answered.

Officer Jenny didn’t take kindly to the half-hearted response. Approaching the trainers, she grasped their ears and yanked mightily. “I said, understand?” she asked again with more assertiveness.

“Owowowow! Okay, okay, we get it! Ow!” shouted Clair.

“Y-yes, the situation is more—Ow!— important than us. P-please let go. Ow!” Alicia pleaded.

“Did you two promised to stop fighting?” Officer Jenny asked with another pull.

“Ow! Yes, we promise! Just let go!” They both answered.

Satisfied, Officer Jenny released her grip as Clair and Alicia nursed their sore ears. “Glad we’re all on the same page.”

“Officer Jenny!” Out came a fellow officer, “We’ve received word from the patrol unit. They spotted the criminals.”

“Where are they now?”

132111.content:
“Okay… this is… unexpected,” Flannery said perplexed. “I wanted to relax and enjoy the sauna, but why did I turn into a sphere? This is part of the experience?” She turned her attention to the wrecked remains of the once functional sauna. “Oh great, how am I going to explain this mess?! Arrgh! This day has not been going my way.”

She let out a sigh to compose herself. “All right, Flannery, calm down,” she reassured herself. “If you explain to the owner what happened, you might able to work out an arrangement. But before that can happen, I need to get back to normal, preferably before—”

“Miss Flannery? Is everything all right?” The redhead’s eyes widen at the sound of a concerned worker.

“Y-Yeah, everything’s fine! No need to check up on me,” Flannery spluttered. She couldn’t let anyone see her like this. Frantically, she flapped her hands and feet in a vain attempt for her globular body to generate movement.

“Are you sure? I heard a crash come from this area…” The worker trailed off as she walked into the doorway. The former sauna laid in tatters on the ground, and in the center lies a spherical towel-clad Flannery. “Oh dear.”

“I-I-I can explain!” Flannery blurted hastily. “Um… Well… You see…”

“You were inflated by the sauna but broke it due to your size?”

“No… I mean yes… Wait, how did you know?”

“Well you’re not the first person to try out the sweller saunas; these are still relatively new, so there are some kinks to work out,” the employee explained.

Flannery blinked, “Sweller saunas?”

“The name isn’t that great, but it does get the point across,” the employee bashfully admitted. “Think of it as a stress reliever; your body expands with pent-up stress before it seeps out into the air, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. And judging from your size looks like you had a tense day.”

“Um, yeah… you can say something like that,” Flannery muttered. “So what happens now? I mean the sauna is destroyed so… hold on, do you hear that?” Her ears caught wind of a hissing noise emitted throughout the room. “I hear something hissing and why do I feel so… relaxed?”

“Sounds like you’re deflating; the steam inside you is trickling out,” stated the employee as she watched the ball-shaped redhead slowly returned to her normal shape.

“Oh, that’s… great,” Flannery blissfully replied, partially aware of her situation. She was too preoccupied with enjoying the sensations to fully comprehend her predicament. It was like all her problems and stress from today practically disappear, allowing her a peace of mind and immerse herself in the moment. “You are right. This really is soothing,” she chirped. “Why didn’t I think of this sooner? This is just what I needed.”

“I’m glad you agree, unfortunately, your time is up.”

“Huh?” Flannery looked down and saw her body was back to its normal size. While disappointed her relaxation ended as soon as it started, she realized she would rather be her regular shape than be an oversized balloon. “Well, it was nice while it lasted.”

“It doesn’t have to be over. We offer other services besides the saunas. You’re welcome to try them.”

Slightly convinced, Flannery pondered for a moment. Between looking after her gym, accepting challenges from trainers, and caring for her Pokémon, she hardly had any time to relax. Or if your body is feeling stiff, then try out one of our body messages. With our massagers’ expertise, they're guaranteed to work out those cricks.”

15.content: Misc / Anime Specific Characters go here
15.title: Everything Else

choices: The trainer sees her as a rare find, and captures her.
The trainer decides to talk to her.
151.content:
A Jigglypuff walks down a road, looking a little depressed. The jigglypuff seems fine, except she has pastel green hair that has a light pink tone to it. Her hair is in a ponytail.

She sighs. And, oddly enough, speaks. "How could this have happened to me...I was never a bad girl..." she says to herself.

The strange thing about this Jigglypuff is that she wansn't always one. Before she somehow became a Jigglypuff, she was just your typical Pokemon trainer. Her name was Yamiko, and she happened to have a thing for, not suprisingly, Jigglypuffs. She only had six Pokemon, and they were all Jigglypuffs.

However, that was before she was transformed into Jigglypuff. To make matters worse, she was extremely weak from the transformation...

Suddenly, a male Jigglypuff hops over to her. "Jig, jig, jigglypuff.(Hi there, Cutie.)"

Yamiko blinks. "Uhm, hello. Why can I understand what you say?" she asks.

The Jigglypuff raises an eyebrow, then chuckles. "Jiggly jigglypuff? Jig jigglypuff, jigglypuff jig jigglypuff. (What did you just say? I can't understand Human, so I don't know what you said.)"

Yamiko sweatdrops. [Oh, that's right.] she thinks. "Jig...jig jiggly Jigglypuff, jig jiggly jiggly. (I...am not a Jigglypuff, I used to be human.)"

The male smiles. "Jigglypuff. Jig jiggly jigglypuff. Jig jig jiggly jigglypuff. (Fooled ya. I understand human just fine. But I don't believe you are human.)"

(from now on, assume the Jigglypuff is speaking jigglypuff, while Yamiko is speaking english.)

Yamiko rubs the back of her head. "I guess it is hard to believe. Besides, I'm a Jigglypuff now, so it doesn't matter." she says.

The male grins. "Exactly." He waddles over to Yamiko and lips locks her. "Mating ritual." he says in a muffled voice.

"Mating...what do you- wait, you don't mea-" she says, muffled. She's interrupted when the male starts blowing her up with his breath. Since she's a Jigglypuff, Yamiko can't really do much besides grow larger.

---

After about twenty minutes of breathing, Yamiko has been inflated to about ten feet. Suddenly, they hear footsteps. The male stops breathing into her. "Sorry, hon. I think you're incredibly cute and all, but I'm not about so give up my freedom over a girl." he says. The Jigglypuff runs for the woods.

[They say chivalry is dead, and guys like that prove it...] she thinks.

Then, the person who they heard walked up to her. "Wow. Either that's a big Jigglypuff, or a Snorlax in disguise. Either way, she's mine." he says, as he pulls out a Heavy Ball. "This should do the trick."

Then, the trainer takes a good look at her. "Wow, that's strange. I've never seen a Jigglypuff that looks like you do."
151.title: The Intro.

choices: She just woke up as a Jigglypuff, no explanation offered.
1511.content:
Around 11 years old, the trainer wasn't that experienced. He only knew of Pokemon that were extrememly rare, or extremely common.

"Mom told me that I should have saved this ball for a special Pokemon, and you're as special as they come." he says, innocently.

Before Yamiko can say anything, a Pokeball hits her body. However, it wasn't just a normal Pokeball. It was a ball specially designed to capture extremely massive Pokemon. Naturally, Yamiko was no match for it, as she gets pulled into the ball in a red ray of light.

---

The next think she knows, Yamiko is once again in front of the boy, but this time, she's in the boy's room. "Hiya." says the boy.

Yamiko can't really get a good look at the place, since she can only face forward. "Huh? Where am...oh wait, I remember now. You trapped me in a Pokeball."

The boy gasps. "Whoa! You can talk?" he asks.

Yamiko moves her body up and down a little. "Yea. And I also used to be a human." she says, somewhat peeved.

"You, human? I hate to burst your bubble...uhm...not pun intended, but you're a Jigglypuff." he says.

Yamiko sighs. "Let me explain..."

---

Afterwards.

"Whoa. What a story. Finding yourself as a Jigglypuff, then getting blown up by the very thing you got turned into. Poor girl." he says.

Yamiko smiles. "Good, I'm glad you believe me...but why did you capture me in the first place?" she asks.

"Well, I have this thing for Jigglypuffs, since they are both cute and inflatible." he says.

Yamiko giggles. "Really? Me too!" she says.

The boy nods. "Yea...but now that I know that you used to be human, I feel kinda bad about it."

Yamiko blinks for a moment. "Hey, what's your name?"

"My name's Cory, and your name is?" he asks.

"My name's Yamiko. Pleased to meet you."

---

Cory stands at about 4 feet tall, and wears clothes that are fairly plain. His hair is brown, and he has a normal build.

---

Later, they are walking down a road. Yamiko is normal sized, for a Jigglypuff, anyway. Cory agreed to let Yamiko remain out of her Pokeball if she promised not to run off the first time they got outside. Forturnately for Yamiko, she didn't want to get away from Cory.

"You know, Cory, you're a pretty nice guy." Yamiko says.

"Thanks. Hey, how old are you, anyway?" Cory asks.

Yamiko sighs. "I'm 12. I've been a Pokemon trainer for 2 years...and a pokemon for 2 days."

"What happened, anyway?" Cory asks.
1511.title: Hook and Sinker.

choices: Deflate, then use 20 feet worth of helium. (No popping, just plain deflation.)
15111.content:
Yamiko sweatdrops. "I don't know. I just woke up a couple of days ago and I was a Jigglypuff. Maybe I liked Jigglypuffs so much that I became one."

Cory chuckles. "Probably. Your parents know?"

Yamiko nods. "Yea. I only live with my mom, but she doesn't seem to mind."

"So...what's it like?" he asks.

Yamiko giggles. "It's wierd. It feels like I'm a ball of air."

Cory nods. "So, how did it feel to be inflated?"

Yamiko thinks back to when the Jigglypuff blew her up. She remembered that she felt funny, but in a good way.

"Well...it felt kinda nice. Odd, but nice." Yamiko says. "Why?"

Cory chuckles. "Well, you remember when I said I like Jigglypuffs because they're both cute and inflateable?" he says as he digs through is pack.

Yamiko chuckles. "Oh, I get it." she says.

Cory pulls out a normal air tank. "How big?"

Yamiko thinks back to when she was around 15 feet wide. [Hum...I didn't feel too much pressure when I was that big, so I could probably stand a lot of air.]

Yamiko grins. "How much does it hold?" she asks.

Cory looks at the tank. "It says 20 feet." he says.

Yamiko nods. "Ok, then just empty the tank on me."

Cory nods, and hands the hose to Yamiko. "Here you go." he says.

Yamiko stick the hose into her mouth. "Ready." she says, in a muffled tone.

Cory turns the dial on the tank to full blast. Yamiko grins as she quickly grows large. Within a minute, she has grown to ten feet wide.

At around 17 feet, Yamiko's little stubs of feet and hands sink into her, making her look like a completely round ball. After 2 minutes, the tank is empty.

Cory looks at Yamiko. "Wow. You're a ball, Yamiko."

Yamiko smiles. "Yeah. Ohh...it feels great."

Cory smiles. "Well, I'm glad your happy. So, what now?"
15111.title: Big and Puffy

choices: keep inflating her till she pops
151111.content:
Cory pulled the hose out of Yamiko's mouth and she blew out the air inside of her.
Yamiko: "Do you have any helium tanks?"
Cory: "I think so."
After looking he found one, he then took the hose and put it in Yamiko's mouth.
Cory: "Ready?"
Yamiko noded and Cory turned the tank on, she started to inflate with helium. It didn't take long before she started to float into the air.
Cory: "You want to keep going?"
Yamiko nodded again and she inflated faster. After an hour, she was 25 feet round. Cory looked at Yamiko's inflated body and got to thinking.
151111.title: Jigglypuff inflates.

choices: "Nah!  I'd rather deflate, and try something else first!"
"I guess I'll just have to find out how it feels *giggle* !"
1511112.content:
Cory turned off the helium tank, which surprised Yamiko.

“Mmmph?!”

“I just wanted to tell you that if we keep going, you’ll probably pop!” said Cory. “It’s okay if you do though; I can just use a Revive, and you’ll be back to normal.” He pulled a Revive out of his pocket, and showed it to the weather balloon-sized pokemon/girl. “Do you want to keep going?”

Yamiko thought for a moment: On one hand she would pop, which kind of scared her a little. On the other hand, she felt so good being inflated to her current gigantic size, she almost wanted to burst, just to see if it felt good too.
1511112.title: Final Warning

15111122.content:
Although she could not speak with the hose in her mouth, Yamiko’s giggle & smile told Cory her answer. Placing the Revive in his shirt pocket where he could easily find it, Cory turned on the helium tank once more, full blast!

Yamiko squealed with delight, and Cory covered his hears, as the Jigglypuff inflated even bigger. Her body began to make creaking noises, like a balloon getting ready to explode, causing both of them to giggle in anticipation.

At this point Yamiko did not even care anymore if popping felt good or not; being inflated to her bursting point like this was the best thing she ever felt in her life!

Cory simply cheered Yamiko on. While she was the first human-turned-Jigglypuff that he had ever encountered, Yamiko was not the first pokemon he had ever over-inflated. He was glad he had brought those air/helium tanks.

And those extra Revives.

A final, long, drawn-out creak could be heard, and Yamiko shut her eyes eagerly awaiting her big “finish”...
15111122.title: Jigglypop!

choices: It is an object to help her.
151111221.content:
...But nothing happened!

“Mmmmh!?” Unlike when Cory had turned off the tank, Yamiko was upset this time.

“Hang on!” Cory checked the tank. “Darn! It must be empty!”

Yamiko pouted, the hose connected to the tank the only thing keeping her from floating away, and thus being the only reason why she did not spit it out. It was quite apparent though she wanted Cory to do something about the situation.

“Hmm . . . We already emptied the air tank, and I can’t just leave you here to go get another.” Cory mused.

“You could try popping me yourself.” Thought Yamiko, wishing she did not have to keep the hose in her mouth. She also knew that if she had TRIED to speak, she would probably end up just deflating, and after all she and Cory had done so far, she just HAD to pop!

“Um, I suppose...” Cory snapped his fingers. “Ah, that’s it!”

“Mmmm?!” Yamiko saw Cory start rummaging through his bag. She hoped it was for another air tank, or a pin, or something.
151111221.title: ...Or not.

1511112212.content:
“Gardevoir, I choose you!” Cory tossed out a Pokeball, which brought out a green, feminine-looking pokemon.

<Yawn! Oh, good morning master.> For some reason Yamiko could hear the Gardevoir’s voice in her head, although the pokemon said nothing. <Oh my! I see we have a new team member! *giggle* >

“Yamiko, my Gardevoir is able to make air expand inside of things, using her Psychic power.” Explained Cory. “She sometimes makes already inflated balloons pop, by accident.”

< And sometimes inflated pokemon, too.> added the Gardevoir, with a giggle. <It won’t hurt, I promise.>

Yamiko considered this proposition... Being popped through a Psychic ability did sound rather fun, and Cory’s Gardevoir did seem pretty nice, but... She really had her heart set on Cory being the first to make her burst.
1511112212.title: Who's That Pokemon?!

choices: Yamiko accidentally blows the helium into Cory!
15111122121.content:
<Um, master?> said (?) Gardevoir, placing her hand gently on Yamiko. <Is she really a pokemon? Her thoughts are being made in a human’s voice.>

“Well, she’s actually a human who somehow got turned into a Jigglypuff ... Wait! You can hear her? What is she trying to say?” Cory leaned in close.

A moment passed by. <She says she does not want to let the helium out so she can’t speak right now, and that she really, REALLY, wants you to pop her!> The Gardevoir giggled, and snuggled the over-inflated Jigglypuff a little. <It’s so romantic! She want’s you to be her ‘first’!>

Cory of course blushed at this. “B-but um, well, if I take out the hose, she might float away, or we might both go flying into the sky, or something...”

<No need to worry! Watch!> Gardevoir floated up to the top of the nearly forty-foot wide pokemon, and straddled her gently. There was a small flash of blue, and the hose fell out of Yamiko’s mouth, yet she remained floating in the same spot. <There, now you can blow her up mouth-to-mouth, and make her burst!>

“O-okay! If that’s what Yamiko wants.” Cory knelt in front of the pokemon/girl. “Is it?”

Yamiko was blushing so deeply, that her cheeks looked more maroon than pink, but she smiled in agreement, and puckered her rather already puckered lips.

As Cory began kissing and inflating Yamiko, Gardevoir enjoyed both the sensation of having the huge, about-to-pop pokemon underneath her, and the feelings she was empathetically getting from Yamiko as she began to get bigger still...

“I’m going to pop! I’m going to pop!” thought Yamiko, as Cory blew into her. “More! More!! Burst me! Pop me!! Oh, I’m going to-”
15111122121.title: Her First

choices: Have her meet his other pokemon, first.
Introduce her to his sister first.
151111221212.content:
*Puff!* *Puff!!* *Puuuuuffff-*

KA-BOOOOOOOOM!!!!!

Cory was knocked flat on his back, and his Gardevoir was shot straight up into the air, as Yamiko exploded instantly into hundreds of little pink shards!

From Yamiko’s point of view, her explosion was much more than an ‘instant’; she could feel her back split open and her rubbery pokemon body rip wonderfully into shreds, as she popped like the gigantic balloon she was. All the air rushing out of her body so violently felt surprisingly even BETTER than how it felt going in to begin with, which she had enjoyed immensely. It was with that thought that she finally let herself be carried away in the bliss of being blown to bits!

Before any of Yamiko’s pieces could get lost or blown away, Cory pulled the Revive from his pocket, and in a flash, Yamiko sat in his hands; whole & asleep, with a content smile on her little pink face.

“I think she enjoyed it.” Chuckled Cory.

<You bet she did!> giggled Gardevoir, floating down. <I don’t think even Electrodes enjoy exploding as much as her!> Gardevoir rubbed one of her legs. <I’m all tingly, where she popped on me! *giggle* Your other pokemon are going to have so much fun playing with her!>

“I think maybe we should let her rest, first.” Cory picked up his backpack, while still gently holding the sleeping pokemon/girl. “Let’s head home for now.”

<OOH! Are you going to introduce her to your other pokemon, there?> Gardevoir floated behind Cory, mischievously. <Or do you want to show her to your sister first, master?>

Cory had not thought about it until his Gardevoir brought it up, but his big sister did have a thing for inflation too, particularly inflating pokemon, and he was pretty sure she and Yamiko would get along pretty well...
151111221212.title: JigglyPOPPED!!!

choices: Let Yamiko burst high in the sky and scatter to the winds.
Find some way to inflate her constantly without bursting.
151111222.content:
The creak continues until Yamiko's body bursts with a loud bang. Still conscious somehow, Yamiko feels every part of her body tingle delightfully as she she splits apart, and what looks like an instant to Cory feels like a minute or two to Yamiko, until the feeling starts to fade, only to be replaced by a different sensation: Feeling things from multiple places at once, which, to Yamiko, felt just as good as being inflated. Yamiko's face is the only part of her that remains intact. She giggles a little, not really caring if her parts start to blow to the winds.

Cory feels differently though, and uses the revive on her as soon as he knows she's all there. Yamiko sighs as she comes back together. "Aww...being like that felt as good as being inflated..." Yamiko says, which gives Cory a couple of ideas.
151111222.title: POP!!!

choices: They puff up as they cuddle.
They have to manually puff up.
1511112222.content:
Suddenly, Cory gets an idea and looks through his bag until he finds a moon stone. "I think this will do the trick, if you don't mind. I heard Wigglytuffs can inflate without limit." he says.

Yamiko thinks for a moment, then nods. "Alright then, make me into a Wigglytuff." she says, giggling a little. Cory bends down and touches the stone to Yamiko's head. A light envelops her as her body starts to change shape, growing taller and a little wider while growing rabbit-like ear. Before long, Yamiko is completely evolved into a Wigglytuff. "Ooooh...interesting..." Yamiko says as she looks over her altered body.

Cory grins and can't help but give Yamiko a hug. As he hugs her, he begins to feel strange. He looks himself over and realizes that he's starting to become a Wigglytuff too. Yamiko watches with interest as her friend finishes transforming. "Heh...I guess this is what I get for messing with a human-turned Jigglypuff...I can't say I mind at all, though." he says.

Yamiko giggles. "I think I know what you mean...for some reason, I don't think I really want to go back to being human...not now, anyway." she says, as she hugs Cory. Cory hugs back, and they soon find themselves cuddling each other. "Mmm...now...what are we going to do about getting bigger?" asks Yamiko as she continues to snuggle up with Cory.
1511112222.title: Wigglytuffs

choices: Show Yamiko the rest of his Pokemon.
151112.content:
"I have a nice idea. Why don't you become a big sphere like me?" Yamiko suggests.

Cory sweatdrops. "Huh? You want me to be like you are right now?" Cory asks.

Yamiko nods. "You are happy when I'm happy, right?"

Cory smiles. "That's right. I get you. I like the idea myself. It's just out of the blue, that's all."

Cory pulls out another tank and sticks the hose into his belly button. "Ok, here's to you, Yamiko." he says, as he turns the dial on the tank. He looks down as his body quickly begins to round out.

Five mintues pass, and at this point, Cory looks like a gaint ball with hands, feet, and hands. But within seconds, thoes parts of his body sink into his flesh, making him look like nothing more than a giant, clothed, flesh colored ball. At this point, he's 10 feet wide, but he continues to grow until he is as big as Yamiko. That's when the tank is empty.

His clothes seem to stretch really well on his body. The only place where his flesh shows is where his limbs, hands, feet, and head used to be. Cory manages to tilt his body until his face meets up with Yamiko's.

Yamiko giggles. "So, how do you like it?" she asks.

"Weird, but nice." Cory says. "However, we can do this longer some other time."

Yamiko sighs. "Ok. But why?" she asks.

Cory smiles. "I live with my 14 year old sister. And I want to introduce you to her." Cory explains, as he deflates himself.

Yamiko is deflating herself as well. "But won't you get you into trouble when she sees me?" she asks, as she fully deflates.

Cory chuckles. "Hardly. My sister probably likes inflation more than I do." he explains, as he stops inflating at five feet round. "Oh. I'm stuck. Wanna help me get rid of the rest of this air, Yamiko?"

[He's probably not stuck. He probably wants to fill me with the remaining air. But since he's so sweet and all, that's fine by me. Besides, I like being inflated.] Yamiko thinks. She nods, walks up to Cory, and hops on him. Yamiko puts her lips on Cory's.

Cory breathes into Yamiko, causing her to fill up while Cory empties. Soon, Cory is normal sized, and Yamiko is a 4 foot round ball with feet and hands. "Ahh...that never gets old." she says. "Anyway, is there anything you want to do before you introduce me to your sister?"
151112.title: Both at the same time.

choices: Cory plans to do it after Yamiko is introduced to Cory's sister.
1511122.content:
(Assume everyone but Yamiko and human beings speak Pokemon.)

Cory nods. "Yea, before I go, I guess I better show you my Pokemon."

"Why, is there something special about them?" Yamiko asks.

Cory nods. "You'll see."

He then throws down his Pokeballs. Then open up, and some fairly round figures emerge.

One of the Pokemon is a Vulpix, and the other is an Eevee. Both are about 3 feet wide wide, and seem to be perfectly happy.

Yamiko giggles. "I see you've made inflating things into a hobby of sorts."

Cory nods. "Yea, well, you know me." he says. "Anyway, you think you can tell me what's on their minds? They seem happy and all, but I want to know how they feel."

Yamiko nods. "Sure thing. I've been wanting to test out this 'Pokespeak' thing of mine anyway." she says, as she turns to the Eevee and Vulpix.

"So...what's up?" she asks, in the human language.

The Vulpix giggles. "I wish I was." the Vulpix says, in it's own tounge.

Yamiko chuckles, making out every word the Vulpix said. "Anyway, I think I should get this out of the way first: My name's Yamiko, and I'm a female Jigglypuff. What about you two?"

"I'm a female, and neither of us have a name. Not that we need names. After all, it's not too common to find Pokemon who are always inflated, except for you guys, of course." the Vulpix explains.

The Eevee speaks up. "I'm a female too, suprisingly."

Yamiko grins. "You two said you are always inflated...why?" Yamiko asks.

Eevee smiles. "We wouldn't have it any other way. We love this, right, Vulpi?"

Vulpix nods. "Yea. It's big fun, literally." she says.

Yamiko smiles. "Ok, my last question for now. Do you two want to inflate in any special way?" she asks.

"Well, I want to be a hot air balloon." Vulpix says.

The Eevee smiles. "Yea, that's what I want too...well, actually, that would require me to evolve into a Flareon. What I really want to do is get really big."

Yamiko nods. Vuplix clears her throat. "Oh, and since you're gonna be telling this stuff to Cory, tell him that we wanna try that round thing you two did."

"Huh? How did you know?" Yamiko asks.

"After about 30 minutes of being in the Pokeball, it switches to a one way window mode. We can see out, but you can't see in." the Eevee explains.

Yamiko nods. "Ohh. I see."

She then turns to Cory. "Ok, I've talked to them. Vulpix want's to be a hot air balloon, and Eevee wants to be huge. Oh, and they want to be round like like we were a few moments ago." she says.

Cory blinks. "Well, let me see..."
1511122.title: Pnumatic Pokemon

15112.content:
"Well, it went like this." she says.

---

About 2 days ago.

Yamiko is to Goldenrod City, since she had heard of a job at the gym there. The gym leader, Whitney, was looking for someone who specialized in normal type Pokemon. Since she had nothing but 6 Jigglypuffs, she thought she was sure to make the cut.

However, before she was about to enter the gym, when a man walked up to her. "Hello, are you here about the job offer?" he asks.

Yamiko nods. "Why yes sir, I am."

He grins. "I thought so, little girl. Let me tell you a story." his kind tone suddenly turns mean. "I am a member of Team Rocket, however, because of their cutbacks due to the dissappearance of our leader, there were cut backs. And I got cut back. So I'm a little disgruntled." he explains. "Match! Here! Now!"

Yamiko smiles. "Ok..." she throws out a Pokeball.
One of her Jigglypuffs pop out.

"Heh. Ok then, this should be easy." The man says. He tosses his Pokeball out, and a Miltank pops out. "How about a little wager. This one Pokemon can beat all your Pokemon. Win, and I'll drop out of the race, so to speak. Lose, and you have to."

"Fair enough." Yamiko says.

---

"He made his Miltank use Rollout on all of my Jigglypuffs. The first one I called out only stood up to two hits. The others were beaten before they could even attack. My price was to not apply for the job. That was what I aggred to..."

---

"What was that!? You call yourself a Pokemon trainer...well, I said if I won, you would have to forget about the job, and I'm gonna make sure you keep that promise."

"Are you gonna..." she gulps. "...kill me?" she asks.

He grins. "No. That would be rash..."

---

"He pulled out a strange gem, then pointed it at me. After that, he never said another word to me. The gem shot a beam at me, and before I knew it, I was a Jigglypuff. And then he had the nerve to run of with my Pokemon." she says.

Cory sits just sits there. "Wow...but arn't people looking for you."

Yamiko nods. "Local girl kidnapped by possible member of defunct criminal organization." she says, imitating a newpaper headline. "I'm the 'local girl' in that sentence. And they are looking for a human, not a Jigglypuff."

"So, let me guess, you are trying to return home, right?" Cory says.

Yamiko nods. "I'm been walking from Goldenrod City since. I lived in Violet City."

Cory smiles. "You're in luck. I live in Azalea Town." he says.

Yamiko grins. "Cool. That's not to far. So, are we going there, or not?"

"Of course. You don't want your parents to worry about you, do you?" Cory says.

And with that, the two turned back and headed to their destination.
15112.title: To Violet City. (Coincidence? You be the judge.)

choices: Cory and Yamiko go about their business.
Cory and Yamiko try to find out what's going on.
151121.content:
Two days later, in Violet City.

"It took us long enough to get here." Cory said.

Yamiko looks around. Then, she points at a house. "There! That's it!" she says.

They both walk up to the door and ring the bell. Yamiko stands behind him. A pastel green haired woman in her 30's answers to door. "Hello, may I help you, young man?"

Cory nods. "I know something about your...daughter." he says.

The woman smiles. "Oh, you mean Yamiko was the girl who was kidnapped in Goldenrod?"

Cory sweatdrops. "Yea, something like that." he says. The woman seems unfazed.

"Well, I knew she would be alright. After all, she is a strong, smart -" she says.

"Jigglypuff." Cory says.

The woman blinks. "Jigglypuff?"

Yamiko steps in front of Cory. "Hi mom. I'm back a little early." she says.

The woman sighs. "Oh, Yamiko. Not you too."

Yamiko raises an eyebrow. "Not me too?"

---

A moment later, inside Yamiko's house. "I take it you two haven't seen a radio or TV within the last week or so." Yamiko's mom says. (We'll just call her Mom from now on)

Cory shakes his head while Yamiko turns her body side to side.

"Well, watch this, then." Mom turns on the TV.

A couple of people are at a newsdesk, with a banner that reads 'Special Report'.

---

"This is day 6 of our special report. As you may probably know, there has been a rash of attacks on the Gym Leaders of both the Kanto and the Johto reigons." the male says.

"Yes, it appears that in every gym in the Kanto Reigon and half here in Johto has had the gym leaders and assistants turned into Pokemon." The female says.

The male has a piece of paper handed to him. "This just in, we have live coverage from a large amount of gyms in both reigons."

---

Several live accounts from the Gym leaders of various gyms. However, after a few of these live reports, the transmission turns to static.

A chair appears when the static clears. A minute passes.

"...your morons! Turn the chair!" he yells, as two people walk up to the chair.

"Sorry boss." says the male, who's head is just above the camera.

"Here you go." a female says, who's head is also hidden off camera.

The female turns the chair, to reveal a Persian.

"...go away now!" the Persian yells.

They do. "Ahem! Anyway, you might not recongise me, but I was the once great leader of the Virdian City gym, and leader of Team Rocket, Geovanni. As you may have known, I was found out, and I disappeared."

The figure snarls. "Anyway, I don't know how I became like this, but now I am exacting my revenge. As you may know, a mysterious man has been walking from gym to gym, turning the occupants into Pokemon. I know the person, or being, who did this to me is out there, so if you want this stopped, come to me. I know you can find me." he says, as the image once again distorts to static.

---

Cory and Yamiko blink. "Whoa, this is bad." Cory says. "I wonder who he is talking about?"

---

A random town. A cloaked figure just saw Geovanni's message. "Geovanni...so you finally show your face." the figure says. "You will fail on your misguided quest." the figure then teleports away.

15311.content:
Originally by RX-78-2:

"That's it!" Duplica exclaimed after some deliberation. "Like most Pokemon, Jigglypuff has a high pitched voice! That's what's missing!"

Duplica then waddled off towards a storage closet in the back of her theater. For safety reasons, Duplica never ordered Ditto to transform for either an Onix or a Golem impression. To do the impressions, Duplica started used specially made costumes which she would inflate with helium so that she could move about freely. The three tanks Duplica had, two were to be used as backups while one was being refilled, were stored in a closet near the costumes and the other gray clothing she used.

Reaching the closet, Duplica opened up the door and pulled out a bright red tank and a hose. Connecting one end of the hose to the tank and putting the other end in her mouth, Duplica almost turned the valve when she remembered something.

'According to the mail this morning, the company I bought the tanks from said one of them had a bad valve.' Duplica thought. 'The problem was that a few valves they made recently vented gas at full blast.'

Looking over the valve, Duplica didn't think it was a bad one. She had the tanks for two weeks now, and a letter from the company suggested a recently found malfunction. She probably got a letter because the company defined recent by anything that happened in a month. Duplica, cautious nevertheless, turned the valve on.
